name: Custom Admin Menu
author: DuoGeek

sections.description:
While working with WordPress sites, you may feel the need for renaming or re-arranging WordPress menus. With this plugin, you can do it with just couple of clicks. You don’t need to write a single line of code for changing menu names and re-arranging their position in the left menu panel.

You can also change color and lots of other stuffs in the paid version.

Features
1. Change any menu name
2. Re-arrange menus as you want
3. Very easy user interface
4. Beautiful Design
5. Simple to use
sections.installation:
Way 1:
1. Download the plugin file
2. Unzip the file into a folder on your hard drive
3. Upload via FTP into your plugins (/wp-content/plugins/) folder
4. Activate the plugin from your dashboard

Way 2:
1. From Dashboard > Plugins > Add New > Upload the plugin
2. Activate the plugin

short_description: Custom Admin Menu is the best plugin for managing your WordPress Dashboard Menus.
